comment._content: www.geograph.org.uk/photo/806139 See photo from British Library of same vintage with similar boat. www.bl.uk/onlinegallery/onlineex/earlyphotos/f/006zzz1035... and one with similar view. www.bl.uk/onlinegallery/onlineex/earlyphotos/f/006zzz1035... I think the trees at left of the photochrom are also in the second BL photo.
